participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and friendly, Alex enjoys casual conversations and often keeps the tone light.
participant_1.background: He works in marketing and has a passion for technology and gaming.

participant_2.name: Jamie Lee
participant_2.personality: Curious and slightly playful, Jamie loves to engage in discussions and often uses humor to lighten the mood.
participant_2.background: She is a student studying psychology and enjoys reading and exploring new ideas.
